degree_descriptions: Node 1 has 3 connections: Node 2, Node 3, Node 4.
Node 2 has 3 connections: Node 1, Node 3, Node 4.
Node 3 has 3 connections: Node 1, Node 2, Node 4.
Node 4 has 3 connections: Node 1, Node 2, Node 3.
shortest_path_descriptions: The shortest path from node 1 to node 2 is through nodes 1 -> 2.
The shortest path from node 1 to node 3 is through nodes 1 -> 3.
The shortest path from node 1 to node 4 is through nodes 1 -> 4.
The shortest path from node 2 to node 1 is through nodes 2 -> 1.
The shortest path from node 2 to node 3 is through nodes 2 -> 3.
The shortest path from node 2 to node 4 is through nodes 2 -> 4.
The shortest path from node 3 to node 1 is through nodes 3 -> 1.
The shortest path from node 3 to node 2 is through nodes 3 -> 2.
The shortest path from node 3 to node 4 is through nodes 3 -> 4.
The shortest path from node 4 to node 1 is through nodes 4 -> 1.
The shortest path from node 4 to node 2 is through nodes 4 -> 2.
The shortest path from node 4 to node 3 is through nodes 4 -> 3.
